website_summaries.verdict: Creatine powder that mixes well, unlike many competing brands.
pros: Though creatine is not water soluble, this micronized creatine powder mixes well so you don't have to deal with pellets at the bottom of your drink
Customers found the unflavored variety to be plain but not unpleasant, and many flavors are available as well
72 servings with 5 grams of creatine each
cons: Some customers did not notice any differences in weight or performance with this powder

customer_reviews.title: Suspicious
customer_reviews.text: I emailed the company asking where they sourced their creatine from (Animals? Plants? Synthetic? Just generally asking what is it made of) & to sum up their answer they said, it depends where they can find it cheapest so they do not exactly know. I found that to be super suspicious. It is unflavored but when I mix it with water it tastes absolutely awful! Would never recommend or purchase this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: This is Creatine.
customer_reviews.text: This is Creatine. I mean, what are you expecting? Chug it down with something flavored or, if you are a crazy person, take it raw or in water without flavor. It delivers what you are asking for: creatine. If you are dissatisfied, you either bought the wrong product, are upset with it being overpriced (spoiler: probably is, but whatever), or creatine does not work for you. If you want creatine from a company that makes creatine that's actually creatine, this is a place to buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super juicy pumps
customer_reviews.text: Super juicy pumps...I’ve been cutting for a little over two months now - only been using CLA daily & a multi vitamin, two low carb days followed by one high carb day. Starting weight was 197lbs and I’m down to 189 with about 9-10% bf. Wanted to throw something in the mix to pick up the workouts a bit and this is all I needed. Ridiculous pumps. Drink your water.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Nolt

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and effective.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Been using it about a month and I've definitely seen results. I have lost over 100lbs in the last two years and am now working on gaining muscle mass. This has given me the added tone and definition I had been missing. Its unflavored so I usually toss it in with my pre work out or my post work out protein shake. Will re order along with Cellucor Molten Chocolate whey protein as well. I also havent felt any side effects or issues with my body since starting it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Supplement
customer_reviews.text: Great Value Creatine! Many lifters know the great benefits creatine has in helping increase lean muscle mass. I personally mix with my post workout shake as it dissolves well and disappears into the mix. I would recommend taking only 1 scoop per day either before or after a workout session to keep the gains going.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Cox

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Although “unflavored”, it still has a bitter taste when consuming, noticeable with my Vanilla whey shakes, but less so with my Chocolate. Probably best consumed with another mix that has a strong flavor to mask the bitterness. Some residual creatine at the bottom after dissolving, but overall dissolves well.
customer_reviews.author: rosine

customer_reviews.title: Felt awful
customer_reviews.text: Made me nauseous after first use felt terrible at the gym. Haven’t used since and have felt perfectly fine drinking other energy strengthening products
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Gerena

customer_reviews.title: does not dissolve well, also has a little taste
customer_reviews.text: Even with the recommended amount of water and more, a scoop of this does not dissolve fully. You also have to pre load 4 times a day for 5-7 days if you’re not currently consuming a creatine product. Meaning 20 to 28 servings of the 72 will be gone.
customer_reviews.author: Ry

customer_reviews.title: looks extremely unsafe
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the package, the inside was covered in white powder like it was halfway opened. I literally had to wipe the entire canister off. The tape seal was barely on & the cover seal was halfway on. I tossed this in the trash. I don't trust this. I wouldn't recommend you purchase this. I will count it as a lesson learned and will toss the entire canister in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Fit Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Creatinine, Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Not a lot to say here, it does the job, and it does it well. I think it tastes pretty tasteless, especially with warm water.
customer_reviews.author: Lucas Almond

customer_reviews.title: Love this. Good price and easy to take
customer_reviews.text: Great increases in strentgh and it's got a great price. Lasts at least 2 months and it's easy to take as well!
customer_reviews.author: FamilyAmazon

customer_reviews.title: I mix it with my protein or in cool water. Some undissolved powder settles at the bottom ...
customer_reviews.text: The results are as desired for a creatine. I mix it with my protein or in cool water. Some undissolved powder settles at the bottom of the water after a minute or two. I just shake each time before drinking. Not a problem for me
customer_reviews.author: Roland

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: First time I used this I gained a lot and felt much better. Of course I was using this in addition with other things but without this for sure the results would've been different. If it's your first time in a gym take advantage of those changes your body is going through and use this.
customer_reviews.author: LALR18

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for the price. My son puts it in his protein shakes as he is trying to gain weight. Smooth and clear.
customer_reviews.author: Heather N.

customer_reviews.title: Good creatine
customer_reviews.text: Very fine powdered creatine. No flavor and mixes into anything very easily. Cellucor makes great products and this did not disappoint. I had no issues using this product and 72 servings under 10 bucks is a good deal
customer_reviews.author: John DTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: stay puft marshmallow man
customer_reviews.text: This product... wow! Never tried creatine before. Gives you definite bulk but you may lose your cut. Increased strength and the pump feeling after lifting is great. Noticeable difference for sure. I also fast 16-19 hours during the week, which helps me avoid turning over pillowy from this stuff. Haha. Recommended for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Keith

customer_reviews.title: Great product. No issues mixing with my preworkout
customer_reviews.text: Great product. No issues mixing with my preworkout. There is no taste and no stomach issues like some creative can give you. I buy this regularly.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan Meadows

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product!!
customer_reviews.text: Mixes great no issues can’t even tell it’s in my drink works like it should!!

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff

customer_reviews.title: Great for the Price
customer_reviews.text: I have this on regular order now. I have used it for a few months and have had very good results. I saw solid gains my first month of using it. For the price you pay I don't know how to beat it. It is completely tasteless so you can use it in anything. It does take a while to fully dissolve but I don't really care about that.

customer_reviews.title: Creatine Crazy!!

customer_reviews.title: Great product

customer_reviews.title: Caused me lower back pain
customer_reviews.text: After starting to use this product I started noticing pain in my lower back in the kidney area. I stopped using it and the pain went away. A few days later I started using it again and the kidney area pain came back a few days later I started using it again and the kidney area pain came back so I stopped using it and now I'm throwing it in the trash because there must be something wrong with us and I don't want to injure myself by using it

customer_reviews.title: I always struggle to determine how well if at all ...

customer_reviews.text: This is a great option for creatine. Simple, cheap, and effective. It's hard to best for the price and is better than anything you could get at a grocery store.

customer_reviews.title: I like it do far

customer_reviews.title: I love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! I have been using for about 2 weeks now. I have definitely seen an improvement in strength and pump. I have been mixing it with my pre workout. It doesn't mix that great, but it doesn't affect the taste at all. Just makes it a lil bit gritty.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used ON creatine before but won’t go back because the tub it came in had an opening too small to use when it got low. This is the same quality and the only down side is it appears to be affected by static. When I dump it in the cup, bits of it go everywhere like lint. It’s weird.
customer_reviews.author: Morgoth

customer_reviews.title: Use it all the time
customer_reviews.text: It's not easy getting enough of this in one's diet. However drink lot's of water and use it with a 2 week on and 1 week off process.

customer_reviews.title: Good, but doesn't dissolve completely
customer_reviews.text: This is a solid product and does well in shakes, but when used in clear liquids, it doesn't appear to dissolve completely. This is in 24-30 oz of liquid as well which is much higher than the recommended.

customer_reviews.title: Like all cellucor

customer_reviews.title: Will order a again.
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad product on my second container. I like the unflavored because I can add it to my shake. I hate to have to drink creatine separate. This just makes my life easier. I will order again once I get low.

customer_reviews.title: Better than caffeine
customer_reviews.text: One scoop is all you'll need to get you going!
customer_reviews.author: tommy b.

customer_reviews.title: Creatine Mono magic
customer_reviews.text: This stuff was a game changer for me. I should note there are other brands that work really well too. I experimented with drinking it pre, post, or during my workout and after a few months ive settled on 1 scoop with my amino energy during my workout for a super charged, focused workout and 1 scoop after my workout with gold standard protein. Im getting great results, like ive never seen before, by using it this way. Ive drank ut plain with water too and had no issues with taste or mixability. Great great great supplement for building strength and in turn building muscle.

customer_reviews.title: Great product and great price

Once in the morning and for lunch I take the CREATINE in my fresh ginger tea and a scoop of C4 ...........gives me a boost to finish the day then get a pump on at the gym .

customer_reviews.text: This product delivers as advertised on being micronized creatine, a fine powder when you open it. The price and the amount of servings is spot on. It mixed well in the blender ball (a couple of shakes) with just water with no grains going to the bottom of the bottle like monohydrate creatine. There was no taste regardless of being unflavored and helped me keep on track with my daily supplement intake as well as keeping me hydrated. I skipped the whole loading phase with this product as advised in the comments since I was already on a previous product. With that being said, it gets my seal of approval.

product_meta.title: Cellucor Cor-Performance Creatine Monohydrate for Strength and Muscle Growth, 72 Servings
product_meta.description: From cellucor, the market leaders in the sports fitness industry
feature_bullets: Increase Strength: You workout to get stronger! COR-Performance Creatine harnesses the power of Creatine Monohydrate to support you as you reach your goals.*
Promotes Muscle Growth: Creatine is a legendary supplement for building muscle. COR-Performance Creatine highlights Creatine Monohydrate to optimize lean muscle growth.*

Micronized Formula for Better Absorption: COR-Performance Creatine contains a micronized form of Creatine Monohydrate, which makes it smaller and easier for the body to digest and faster release to the muscles.*
Complements Other Muscle Building Products: COR-Performance Creatine comes unflavored, so you can mix it into your pre-workout or amino-recovery product to enhance results.

100% Satisfaction Guarantee: All Cellucor sales from Amazon.com are guaranteed to provide RESULTS! We understand that your investment into a Cellucor product is an important financial decision. That is why we extend a 30-day, full money-back guarantee when you decide to make that investment. We are so confident you will love the product and see transformative results that we are happy to put our money where our mouth is.*

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
